name: Xpress Coffee
description: Premium coffee beans roasted to perfection with a hint of caramel and chocolate flavor.

name: Decaf Coffee
description: Hand-picked, decaffeinated coffee beans brewed with love and care.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a dollop of foam and whipped cream.

name: Mocha
description: Espresso with steamed milk, topped with a thick layer of cream and chocolate sauce.

name: Cappuccino
description: Espresso, steamed milk, and a shot of espresso-based foam.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A refreshing blend of chocolate, milk, and caramel, perfect for those who crave a gentle kick.

name: Iced Tea
description: A refreshing blend of tea and ice, perfect for those who want to warm up and stay hydrated.

name: Green Tea
description: A refreshing blend of green tea and water, perfect for those who want to feel refreshed and relaxed.

name: Black Tea
description: A refreshing blend of black tea and water, perfect for those who want to enjoy a warm and refreshing brew.

name: Bubble Bath
description: A refreshing blend of bubble bath and water, perfect for those who want to soak in their favorite beverage.
